body_content.explanation: a garden plant with thick, round flower heads that keep their colour when cut and dried:
examples: Globe amaranths will attract butterflies to your garden.
The globe amaranth complements other plants, and is long-flowering and pest-free.
Globe amaranth blooms all summer and into autumn, when many annuals look tired and worn out.

body_content.explanation: a flower from the globe amaranth plant :
examples: The globe amaranth is a useful and popular flower for floral arrangements.
Globe amaranths resemble heads of clover in white, purple, and variegated forms.
